member.name: T:Pavalisoft.Caching.MySql.MySqlStoreInfo
member.summary: Represents MySQL Cache Store Configuration Information

member.name: P:Pavalisoft.Caching.MySql.MySqlStoreInfo.ExpiredItemsDeletionInterval
member.summary: Gets ot Sets the periodic interval to scan and delete expired items in the cache. Default is 30 minutes.

member.name: P:Pavalisoft.Caching.MySql.MySqlStoreInfo.ConnectionString
member.summary: Gets or Sets the connection string to the database.

member.name: P:Pavalisoft.Caching.MySql.MySqlStoreInfo.SchemaName
member.summary: Gets or Sets the schema name of the cache table.

member.name: P:Pavalisoft.Caching.MySql.MySqlStoreInfo.TableName
member.summary: Gets or Sets the Name of the table where the cache items are stored.

member.name: P:Pavalisoft.Caching.MySql.MySqlStoreInfo.DefaultSlidingExpiration
member.summary: The default sliding expiration set for a cache entry if neither Absolute or SlidingExpiration has been set explicitly. By default, its 20 minutes.
